00024     class Socket : public Frame {
00025 
00026      public:
00027 
00028         Socket( string host, string protocol )
00029         {
00030             _info = getInfo( "www.sun.com", "http" );
00031 
00032             _socket = socket( _info->ai_family, _info->ai_socktype, _info->ai_protocol );
00033             cout << "socket = " << _socket << endl;
00034 
00035             int result = ::connect( _socket, _info->ai_addr, _info->ai_addrlen );
00036             cout << "connect = " << result << endl;
00037             
00038             freeaddrinfo( _info );
00039         }
00040 
00041         void initSlots()
00042         {
00043             //setSlot( Symbol::at("test"), new Method<Object>( "test", &Object::_test ) );
00044             //setSlot( Symbol::at("set-slot"), new Method<Object>( "set-slot", &Object::_setSlot_ ) );
00045         }
00046 
00047         string inspect() { return "[Socket]"; }
00048 
00049         addrinfo* getInfo( string host, string protocol )
00050         {
00051             addrinfo hints;
00052             memset( &hints, 0, sizeof( hints ) );
00053             hints.ai_family   = AF_UNSPEC;
00054             hints.ai_socktype = SOCK_STREAM;
00055             
00056             int result = getaddrinfo( host.c_str(), protocol.c_str(), &hints, &_info );
00057             cout << "getaddrinfo = " << result << endl;
00058             
00059             return _info;
00060         }
00061 
00062         void send( const char* data )
00063         {
00064             int result = ::send( _socket, data, strlen( data ), 0 );
00065             cout << "send = " << result << endl;
00066         }
00067 
00068         void send( const void* data, int length )
00069         {
00070             int result = ::send( _socket, data, length, 0 );
00071             cout << "send = " << result << endl;
00072         }
00073 
00074         string receive()
00075         {
00076             char buffer[4096];
00077             
00078             int length = ::recv( _socket, buffer, 4095, 0 );
00079             cout << "recv = " << length << endl;
00080             buffer[length] = '\0';
00081             
00082             return buffer;
00083         }
00084 
00085      protected:
00086

00089             BEG( "Object::_test()" );

00091             Value result = self.setSlot( Symbol::at("foo"), 15.0 );
00092 
00093             END( "" );
00094 
00095             return result;

00097 
00098         Value _setSlot_( Array& args, Value self )
00099         {
00100             return setSlot( *args.at(0).get<Symbol>(), args.at(1) );
00101         }
